The skirt is not great but not terrible. I also noticed the seems are very easily breakable, I snapped multiple just putting it on (I was able to put it on easily, the seems are fragile) As someone with curves, I do like that it's not too tight and easy to put on. 评论概述: One of my favorite staple pieces
评论详情: I bought a large (usually medium to large in most styles/brands) and was impressed with the comfort in this skirt. I thought it may be some polyester or nylon fabric that lots of lower end skirts now come with. However, it was a nice stretchy cotton like material that wasn’t too tight in random spots. It is pretty short so be prepared to either pull it down or put some spandex on if you’re worried. The only other thing to mention is you have to lace the string through the sides yourself, but this didn’t take me any longer than a couple minutes!
Es muy linda y se ajusta perfectamente, es muy cómoda

this product was very short on me, I didn’t even have any shorts that would fit under it. I was a bit disappointed that you had to lace up the size yourself, which I had a bit of struggle with. Even though I will be returning the product, I thought that it had a great quality, but just know that it runs very short . To put it kindly, if I wasn’t wearing any underwear, you could see hair.
My favorite skirt in my closet so far 😍 wear it all the time
